Comment: Spanish Game The Classical Variation. White's two main options after 3...Bc5 are 4. c3 and 4. O-O. Out of these two I'm opting for the slightly more flexible 4.O-O, which also rules out having to learn the unclear consequences of 4. c3 f5!?
